titles.title: A resolution amending the Senate amendment to the bill H.R. 900.

action.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 411 - 7 (Record Vote No: 417).

bill.summary: 10/3/1988--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 900 (West Virginia river conservation), with the Senate amendment thereto, and agreeing to the Senate amendment with an amendment.
